name: Somewhat: Hole-in-the-Wall
description:
Updated: v1.1 added pause [esc], and quick exit to title screen from in-game.

This is a HOLE-IN-THE-WALL game inspired, that doesn't require you to have Oculus or any VR.

What to do?

  • Match the incoming wall obstacle with your character's posture by pressing:
    • [Q] for left arm,
    • [E] for right arm,
    • [Z] for left leg, or
    • [C] for right leg.
  • Or mindlessly destroy the blocks ahead of you! (No points for these, just FUN and entertainment -- similar to Game Shows! HAHA)

The Goal of the game is to pass through at least 20 obstacle holes, after that its Freeplay -- if you wish. STAY SAFE and HAVE FUN!

Commands:

Title Screen - Mouse to click buttons

Pre - Game - A/D for navigation, Space bar to select ( Ready, Set, Go!)

In - Game - W/S to go forward/backward, 1 2 3 4 5 to change positions

In case of score not registering properly: You may pass the obstacle multiple times but it will only register once.

Tip: When you've reach 10 points, the game will play tricks on you, and a disabled button will appear to end the game, it will only be enabled when you reach 20 points.

Thank you for your support! Please donate if you wish ^^
